message: Starting task: Reading week8.json and EXPLANATION_FORMAT_SUMMARY.md to understand the format requirements
Read format reference and week8.json successfully. Found 43 questions across 4 topics, all already have explanation objects. Checking quality against 5-Second Rule before claiming completion.

COMPLETED: Week8.json verified and confirmed complete. All 43 questions across 4 topics have high-quality explanations meeting 5-Second Rule standards. CORRECT explanations cite researchers (Kagan, Harlow, Bowlby, Ainsworth, Murphy, Piaget, Vygotsky), explain WHY (30-60 words). INCORRECT explanations address specific misconceptions (20-40 words) with clear contrasts. No changes needed—file already meets all quality criteria.
